content: I see that there's a way to load/reload a resource in the Java API with cacheResource(), is there a way to unload a resource? This is in the context of the mapping language - if you give it a valid structuredefinition in one call and an invalid in the next, it'll still work even though it shouldn't
@Grahame Grieve @Richard Ettema any ideas by chance?
I just added that. Give me a few hours to finish debugging, and you should see it. DropResource(type, id)
great. note I made it thread safe now
